name: Swissotel Bremen

reviews.text: This hotel was very very nice. Checkin and checkout was fast. The front desk staff were very efficient and polite. The hairdryer did not work in the room. I reported it to the front desk before heading out for the day and when I got back it had been fixed. I was quite impressed. The staff gives you a map of the area and some tips on what to see. They all spoke excellent English. The room was a very nice size. The breakfast was excellent. Everything you need to get a good start on your sightseeing. The location was amazing. You walk out the front door and across a little bridge and you are in the heart of Bremen. Everything you want to see in Bremen is in very easy walking distance of the hotel. We had some excellent meals in Bremen as well. But one place in particular was not condusive to keeping your weight down (lol). The hotel offers parking but it is not attached to the hotel. It is one street over. When you leave the parking structure you would enter the hotel from the back door. Saves walking around to the front. You definitley cannot go wrong staying at the Swissotel.
reviews.title: Location cannot be beat

reviews.text: This is a really brilliant hotel - the service is excellent, bedrooms are large and the beds themselves are massive and incredibly comfortable.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.text: The on-site restaurant and bar are also very, very good and worth visiting even if you are not staying at the hotel.
reviews.title: Good hotel, not perfect

reviews.text: The only downside is that there is no tea/coffee making facilities in the standard rooms, and there isn't a gym or pool (though these are on their way, apparently).
reviews.title: Wonderful stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Swisshotel bremen is a safe choice. I would say its a 4 star hotel. Both regarding the room and the service provided. Our room was little boring regarding decor and way to hot. In the bathroom it got very very hot when you took a shower, as the steam didnt go away. This must be fixed. Overall a good hotel for the price they charge. We only stayed 1 night, so didnt see much of the hotel
reviews.title: Great Location, Friendly Staff

reviews.text: Tram from the airport ( 15min ) stops in front of the hotel. The crew is very friendly, big confortable room and great breakfast
reviews.title: nice/quiet room and perfect location

reviews.text: Perfect location near old town, nearest tram stop on the other side of the street (tram no 6 goes straight to the airport from there), spotless and cozy rooms with basic complimentary amenities, and very welcoming service! We were also delighted how the hotel staff payed attention to families with children. I will definitely choose this hotel again when I'm heading back to Bremen!
reviews.title: Excellent!

reviews.text: This is a good quality hotel in the centre of Bremen. There is a tram from the airport (line 6, costs 2.25 Euros) that stops very near the hotel (Herdentor). The staff are very helpful and friendly. Food and drink are quite expensive but that is the case for all hotels. Breakfast is very good with a wide selection. Personally, I found the bed to be one of the most comfortable I have found in a hotel. And the TV has BBC1, not just the awful BBC world!
reviews.title: Friendly and efficient

reviews.text: I shall stay again.
reviews.title: AMAZING

reviews.text: I've stayed at the Swissotel Bremen a couple of times already and I have to say that every trip to Bremen makes me happy because I get to stay there. The Rooms are in a great design and the view to the "WALL" is very nice, but also the restaurant is very good!
reviews.title: Great hotel, great service, great location, average price

reviews.text: Stayed here for a couple of nights on a business trip. The hotel is in the city centre so very handy for shops, restaurants and the train station. Opposite a small park and small river. No parking at the hotel, need to use a public muti story car park close by if you have a car, they have an arrangement where you can re-use the same card and the charge is added to your bill, costs 12 euros per day.
reviews.title: Good for business travelers

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very happy with my stay here, it’s a typical corporate medium sized hotel. Check in and out was easy, staff polite and helpful, a lower bar that serves snacks and a larger restaurant that doubles as the breakfast area on the first floor. Rooms are OK, clean and bright with the usual facilities – I had one that faced the inner atrium to avoid any noise from outside, very quiet.
reviews.title: one of the best hotels we have stayed in

reviews.text: Directly outside there are plenty of places to eat and drink. Over the bridge is the down town area with lots of shops, bars and restaurants, the area by the main Weser river looked nice. There’s also a number of old buildings in the older part of town. Lots of trams zoom around for easy travel around town. I found driving around very easy, no major traffic queues but lots of traffic lights and try to avoid driving down the central area of the road that is sometimes reserved for trams.
reviews.title: Good quality at a top location

reviews.text: the staff could not have been more helpful.great assistance re things to do and getting around.the rooms were first class as was bremen
reviews.title: Best service and value I have seen in a very long time

reviews.text: The ex Marriott was well refurbished; located in the city center,but on a quiet plaza.. Functionnal rooms, good bedding, clean room & bathroom, good breakfast...
reviews.title: Another successful stay

reviews.text: great location, friendly co-operative staff, excellent breakfast.
reviews.title: well worth it

reviews.text: even a local running map provided!
reviews.title: Everything is perfect
Excellent Location, Very Clean and exceptional Staff
reviews.text: Swissotel always perfect. The service, the location, breakfast quality, comforts of rooms, child style...everything is perfect
Took care of our every need and the staff was very friendly. Quick to give directions and make sure that all of our requests were being taken care of.
reviews.title: Perfect location!

reviews.text: Stayed here for two nights to visit the excellent christmas markets (there are two markets in Bremen ) and this hotel was the perfect choice thanks to tripadvisor. It is in a lovely setting and well placed to walk to the markets - only a five minute walk. We didn't eat in the hotel as we wanted to try some authentic German restaurants, and there are so many!
reviews.title: Great hotel and nice location and food

description: Swissotel Bremen is located in the heart of the historic city. Within walking distance to all major attractions like the town musicians and the charming market square, the hotel’s central location also offers a magnificent view over Bremen’s city wall. 230 elegantly appointed rooms and suites are stocked with exclusive amenities, including cutting-edge modern technology and luxurious amenities such as a free internet connection. A sumptuous breakfast buffet offers a wide range of choices to energise your day, and the sophisticated Hillmann’s Restaurant takes traditional recipes from the Bremen region and gives them an innovative twist.Business travellers will appreciate the expansive meeting and conference space for up to 1000 delegates.
